# OBJECT::SET_WEAPON_IMPACTS_APPLY_GREATER_FORCE

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** object
* **BOOL** applyGreaterForce

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether weapon impacts apply a greater force to this object
